snippet: The Carlyle Group has taken the lead in the bidding for Getty Images, the photographic image service, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
abstract: The Carlyle Group has taken the lead in the bidding for Getty Images, the photographic image service, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Said to Take Lead in Bidding for Getty Images
